```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(plotly)
SLU_Hockey <- read_csv("DF/334FinalProjData.csv")

SLU_Hockey |> print(n = 33)

```

```{r}

plot1 <- ggplot(data = SLU_Hockey, aes(x = games, y = points, label = player)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Points vs Games Played 2023-2024")

ggplotly(plot1, tooltip = "label")

```
